sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERVIUS (Maurus Honoratus), a celebrated grammarian and critic of antiquity, who flouriſhed about the time of Arcadius and Honorius ; now chiefly known by his Commentaries on Virgil. There is alſo extant a piece of Servius upon the feet of verſes and the quantity of ſyllables, called Centimetrum.
